en.accessories_config_message: Accessories are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Accessories are intended to define a single device.
en.accessories_message: Add and order the accessories that belong to this room.
en.available_accessories_message: Select the accessories you want to add to this room.
en.backup_message: Take a snapshot and download your current configuration.
en.bridge_settings_message: This section identifies Homebridge on the system and in Apple Home.
en.default_screen_message: Set the default screen to show when logging in.
en.end_port_invalid: End port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.home_pin_message: The PIN used when adding Homebridge to Apple Home.
en.home_username_message: The username Apple Home uses to identify Homebridge.
en.id_message: This section uniquely identifies the user.
en.interface_settings_message: This section defines the interface look and feel.
en.invalid_inactive_logoff: Invalid inactive timeout, must be between 5 and 60.
en.invalid_port_range: Invalid port range the ending port must be greater then the starting port.
en.language_message: Set the interface language or set it to auto to use the your browser's language.
en.log_out_after_message: Define how long you stay logged in without activity, in minutes.
en.name: Name
en.package_not_found: This package was not found on NPM.
en.permissions_message: This section defines what this user can do on the system.
en.platforms_message: Platforms are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Platforms are intended to define a group of devices (like a hub).
en.port_ranges_message: This section is used to control the range of ports that separate accessories (like camera or television) should be bound to.
en.range_name_message: A port range description used to identify the port range.
en.security_message: Set or change this user's password here.
en.service_description_message: Used with the name to help identify the Homebridge on the system.
en.service_name_message: Used to identify the Homebridge service on the system.
en.service_port_invalid: Service port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.service_port_message: The port Homebridge runs on, the default is 51826.
en.setup_admin_account: To start you need to setup the administrator account.
en.setup_id_message: From the Apple Home app, scan this eight-digit code, or enter manually.
en.show_setup_pin_message: This will show or hide the Apple Home setup PIN and QR code on the status screen.
en.start_port_invalid: Start port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.theme_message: Choose a theme for the interface.
en.unassigned_accessories_message: These accessories are not assigned to a room.
